alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 18 at 2:18PM MST until November 20 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 18 inches from I-80 to the Ogden area mountains. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Western Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 3 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including Parley`s Summit, SR-39, and Logan Summit. Travel may become difficult on untreated, seasonal roads such as Mirror Lake Highway, Monte Cristo and Big Mountain Pass.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Western Uinta Mountains
